name: Cake Duel
summary:
Bluff your way to taking all the delicious cake in this fast-paced card game for 2 players. Cake Duel is a game of deception. Fleece your opponents by playing and bluffing adorable Sheepie cards. Go on the offensive to steal your opponent's cakes while defending your own. Lie about your cards to get ahead, but don't get caught! 
 
If you love games like Werewolf, Cheat, and B.S. then Cake Duel is the game for you! 
 
*This is a mobile port of the popular tabletop card game Cake Duel*
